name: Power-full Plump Lip Balm
about: What it is:A visibly plumping and moisturizing tinted lip balm that blooms into your custom shade by reacting with your lipsu2019 pH level, now in a new coral shade..Formulation Type:Lip Balm & Treatment.Benefits:Plumping.Highlighted Ingredients:- Pumpkin Seed Oil: Helps to add comfort and suppleness..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens and mineral oil. It is also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This visibly plumping lip treatment helps bring lips to their ultimate suppleness, while a unique pH reactor works to transform lips to their most flattering custom shade. It also includes plumping ingredients that deliver visibly luscious volume, while moisturizing ingredients help lips feel as good as they look.
ingredients: Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Isostearyl Isostearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Beeswax (Cera Alba/Cire Du2018abeille), Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcristalline), Menthone Glycerin Acetal, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax (Candelilla Cera/Cire De Candelilla), Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Tribehenin, Sorbitan Isostearate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Lactic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Flavor (Aroma), Citric Acid, Silica. May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Red 27 (Ci 45410), Red 6 (Ci 15850), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply shade First Crush to add a coral flush to the lips. .-Wear alone or use as a prep before any like-tone lip application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin

I have tried several shades and they are all equally as flattering for my tan-olive skin tone! I have coworkers with different skin tones who have also tried this balm and the shades suit them very well too! I love how it doesn't burn or feel uncomfortable like other plumping products and that it hydrates my lips so well. I like to use this as my daily balm, whether I'm going for a natural makeup look,  or prepping  my lips for a matte lipstick, this balm is my go to! One tube lasts so long because it's thick too! Definitely a staple lip product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I opened up this product, the entire lip balm itself was stuck to the top of the cap. Luckily it only took a few wiggles with my finger to loosen it and put it back in the proper packaging with minimal damage, but not a great first impression.   This is a very subtle product; I did notice a slight shift in my lip color and a hint of plumping but nothing compared to the photos advertised. The balm itself was hydrating and the plumping effect felt like a cool mint versus the unpleasant bee-sting lip plumping experience some products have.   I would be happy with the Power-full Plump Lip Balm if it were sold on the lower end of the drugstore spectrum (and ideally without the packaging mishap), since my expectations would be for a hydrating product that might add some color. But for a Buxom product at this price point? I'm not sold.

I would recommend this product if someone was looking for a pretty color that would be hydrating but would not recommend if someone wanted it to plump their lips.

I originally got the Inner Glow/nude shade but it was very terracotta and somehow lighter than my actual lip color and not very flattering so I exchanged it for the clear-to-pink. My lips typically dry out with any of the your custom color lip products, but not this one. The product is round and fat, much larger than your normal tinted lip balm so it's super easy and fast to apply. There is a slight minty tingling sensation for maybe 30 minutes after application but it fades and isn't distracting or painful. The resulting color on me is a nice berry pink, not a hot pink. It feels really comfortable and cushiony on the lips and seems to last for a long time. I'm super happy with this! I own a million lip products but continue to reach for this after buying it in early November. Highly recommend!

It was so hideous and would not come off, almost as if it had stained my lips. I looked like I was wearing a lip gloss from 2002. I donu2019t know if the formula went bad or what but I would not recommend using this product a year after buying.

reviews.review_title: the ONLY lip color product I can live off alone!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have light skin with brownish tones along the sides of my lip lines that make it difficult to find a low maintenance tinted lip balm (usually have to line the corners with a lip liner to neutralize) but this product (in Inner Glow) has become an absolute favorite! I love this so much I had to write my first review ever in support of it and with hopes it never gets discontinued!   You know the color guards for self tanners that make you look bronzed immediately if needed? I love that this lip balm adds a layer of color while also leaving a bit of tint behind so my lips look naturally more rosy and even immediately (unlike the Dior lip glow in both rosewood and original pink which take some time to develop color on my lips and the darker outline of my lip is visible until then)  Love the slight minty scent and feel, although it doesnu2019t really plump. It gives color to my lips and is buildable without getting thick or slipper.   Hydration wise, it doesnu2019t dry my lips but it isnu2019t super moisturizing either (Iu2019ll sometimes layer a thicker moisturizer over for added sheen as well). Itu2019s comfortable enough that I donu2019t need to carry another lip balm.   I am just THRILLED to finally find the one lip product I can chuck into my bag without needing any other lip product to counter my lip lines!

reviews.review_text: I bought this (The Big O) with high hopes, after reading some reviews. I tested it in store on my inner wrist, and it turned a light pink. Aside from the colour change, it didnt feel like it was very plumping, as they claim. I didn't notice a difference in my lips, and the tingling only lasted a few seconds. It also didnt feel very moisturizing. My $15 Glossier balm lasts way longer than this $24 balm. It just felt like a basic lip balm that you could get at walmart for $5.   If the tint didn't look so awful on me, I would probably continue to use it - but wouldn't repurchase.

reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing! I have tried a few lip plumping glosses and the results were horrible. This product does not fail! It plumps my lips while not irritating them at all. I put this on and then a sheer lip gloss and my lips look so healthy, plump and kissable. I feel so sexy and can't help but pout a little when I wear this. I will use this until I'm dead! I hope they never stop making this product. It helps me eliminate the lines in my lips to create the perfect pout. Makes all my lipstick and gloss applications perfect!!! And the best thing is that it doesn't irritate or harm my lips in anyway. I will even wear this to bed. Safe to wear every day, all day. If you have sensitive lips and are on the verge of giving up on finding a lip plumper - try this. I can't live without it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great color, but a thinner consistency that wasn't as hydrating as other Buxom products led me to believe it would be. I also find that it wears off very quickly for a lip balm. Has a tendency to overcolor dry patches on my lips so that they become berry colored thanks to the pH triggered color change. Overall not my favorite but it can be a good lip balm to use when my lips are already hydrated and I just want a pop of color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these lip balms! I got the holiday gift set. The lightest is too light for me but I love the other 3 colors. They moisturise and last longer than I expected. I have brown hair and green eyes and love this red. Adds a pop without being over the top.

reviews.review_title: New favorite, but no major plumping
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good not great. I find it adds prefect color -no color. It feels nice and cooling and it's my go- to after I use my tart lip scrub. I will be buying again, but I wouldn't suggest it if you are hoping for big plumping...I don't find that happens.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are so good! I have several colors. They are so moisturizing and I love how they make my lips feel. This is a staple product for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While I like the tingly cooling sensation of the balm, I was hoping for more of a sheer color.  This was WAY too pink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wasnu2019t as plumping as I was expecting. However it moisturizes very nicely and smells good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I shouldn't admit this, but I have these stored in a bag. I LOOVE them! I buy 4 at a time when i see them because they sell out so fast in store. Ive had 3 ppl get hooked on them. Theyre very hydrating. I also use this as my lipstick. Or the lip gloss to this. So amazing

reviews.review_title: Love the color...not a fan of the size

reviews.review_text: Bought this lip balm in Flushed on a whim. Absolutely love it. Feels great and looks great. I'm the kind of person that doesn't like a lot of color, but still wants a little pop. This did the trick. Only complaint, as stated in other reviews, is that the stick is really large. Like...unnessisarily/can't-fit-it-in-my-small-purse-without-there-being-an-awkward-lump large.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not my color so I had to return the item, too much orange in it for me. BUT.... the power plump lip balms are fabulous. Truely goes on like a chapstick.

reviews.review_title: Good product just not my color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like the product and the plumping factor but don't care for the shade... should've stuck with the sheer. Ordered online so I was taking a chance. However, the ordering was hassle free and shipping was quick!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received all four of these shades in a gift set and couldn't be happier with them! They are moisturizing, buildable, and each have a wonderful, minty scent. My favorite shade is Fiery, but they are all great. I even do notice a slight plumping effect! I highly recommend these to anyone looking for something with subtle color and easy application.

Using more than 1 swipe gives a weird cheap colour,but less than that gives no colour pay off at all. I still use it, but I value it the same as the tube I get at the drug store for 99 cents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This balm is twice the size of a normal lip balm, but I love the way it feels going on my lips. Really really smooth, and the shape is nice. The pink is a bit more intense than what it looks like on the model if you're like me and your lips already have a pink hue. The only issue with this balm is the size. It's too big to go in my pocket and takes up twice as much room as a typical lip balm in my purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
